QuestData.Title: Diametrically Opposed
QuestData.Description: I shall speak plainly to you, little $r. My people have not been the same since our ties with Thorim were severed.$b$bVolkhan will not rest until either he, or we, are no more. We only want peace, but it seems we have no choice but war.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stormherald Eljrrin in the Halls of Lightning wants you to defeat Volkhan.
QuestData.RewardText: Volkhan shall haunt the dreams of my people no more.$b$bContinue your efforts, little $r. In time, I am certain my people will grow to forgive Thorim.
